params.title: 📊 Presentation Overview
params.content:
🎯 Windows 95 Digital Twin System

System Capabilities:

  • ✨ Self-Documenting APIs - Complete machine-readable documentation
  • 🌊 Data Sloshing Pattern - Bidirectional state flow without code changes
  • 📝 Static Instructions - JSON-driven autonomous workflows
  • 💾 State Persistence - Time-travel debugging with IndexedDB

What You're Seeing:

This entire presentation was generated by a static JSON instruction file. No code was modified. The system read the digital twin context, understood the available APIs, and created this experience purely through data.

This is the future of local-first computing: pure data-driven behavior that flows like water through structured channels.

params.title: 💡 Key Innovations
params.content:
Revolutionary Concepts

🧠 Ultra Think

AI cannot distinguish between trained knowledge and injected JSON context. This enables instant expertise and infinite knowledge compounding across agent sessions.

🌊 Data Sloshing

State flows to JSON, JSON generates instructions, instructions execute and create new state. The cycle repeats infinitely. The system evolves through data, not code.

🎭 Digital Twins

Machine-readable documentation that teaches AI about itself. Every discovery updates the twin, compounding knowledge across all future agents. Self-improving systems.
